txt.en:
'[placeholder], it does not seem possible, but I am not blind and have seen it with my own eyes: already a new store of supplies has been deposited at Cuvnerth.

'The Dunlendings have not had time to secure more supplies... they must have a benefactor with great resources, and we must discover who that benefactor is.

'Let me know when you are ready to travel once more to Cuvnerth. There are caverns below the village through which the supplies were probably brought.'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>

'These tidings trouble me, [placeholder]. I do not understand why the Orcs are supplying the Dunlendings... they are as much enemies as the Rohirrim and the Orcs.\n\n'Even if these Orcs are rogues serving no one, this is a troubling alliance.'

'Are you ready to enter the caverns below Cuvnerth? We must discover the source of the Dunlendings' supplies.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
Despite your efforts to disrupt the stockpiles at Cuvnerth, a new store of supplies has appeared at the village.
Talk to Garrun to journey into the cavern below Cuvnerth
Garrun is at his camp, west of Cuvnerth.\n\nYou should speak with Garrun when you are ready to enter Cuvnerth.
Talk to Garrun in the Isendale
Garrun is at his encampment, west of Cuvnerth.\n\nYou should speak with Garrun regarding your discoveries in the cavern.
